<<<<<<< HEAD
A yoke for the Roman-bulls Being a poem written on the royal proclamation for exiling popish-priests and Jesuits, &c. To which is added, A telescope for the new astrologers: or, A looking-glass for the staring star-gazers. Wherein is a reply to the libellious and seditious censurers of the late fire in the City of London. By T. S. Licensed according to authority, the 7th. of Decemb. 1666. T. S.
[2], 10 p.
Printed for S. Speed, at the sign of the Rain-Bow in Fleet-street, [London] : 1666.
Place of publication from Wing. In verse. "A looking-glass for staring star-gazers" has caption title on p. 5. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
